channel.title: Execute/Compile using ssh
channel.description:
Hi guys,
Some may remember me, Some may not..
Im wanting to get back into private servers again, Question.. (This is where my linux skills show)
I have a dedi with ssh acess, Whats the best way to compile/execute server :)
Thanks
